<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o define.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
; Define the macros. #define VOLUME #5000# #define FREQ #440# #define TABLE #1#
; Instrument #1 instr 1 ; Use the macros. ; This will be expanded to "a1 oscil 5000, 440, 1". a1 oscil $VOLUME, $FREQ, $TABLE
; Send it to the output. out a1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Define Table #1 with an ordinary sine wave. f 1 0 32768 10 1
; Play Instrument #1 for two seconds. i 1 0 2 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
